description: This file defines a React component for a page that allows users to invoke external tools via a proxy UI. It manages form inputs for provider, tool, tenant ID, connector ID, and arguments, and displays the results or errors. The code includes hooks for state management and a function to call an API endpoint.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Handles invoking the external tool API with user-provided parameters, manages loading and error state, and updates the result upon completion.
